text: Karen Sparks is a woman who survived Ted Bundyâ€™s brutal attack in 1974. Bundy broke into the basement apartment where Sparks, an 18-year-old University of Washington student and dancer, was sleeping. He bludgeoned her with a metal rod torn from her bed frame and sexually assaulted her with the same rod, causing extensive internal injuries, including a ruptured bladder.
title: Karen Sparks
